h2_title: King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince - Missable Spirit, Item, and Hidden Boss
content: The fight against the King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince can either result in a missable spirit or another boss being hidden, depending on the choices you make.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince - Missable Spirit, Item, and Hidden Boss'.
The content is as follows:
The fight against the King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince can either result in a missable spirit or another boss being hidden, depending on the choices you make.
